pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation and Other Tools for Skew-Unit Models // Provide estimation and data generation tools for the skew-unit family discussed based on Mukhopadhyay and Brani (1995) doi:10.2307/2348710. The family contains extensions for popular distributions such as the ArcSin discussed in Arnold and Groeneveld (1980) doi:10.1080/01621459.1980.10477449, triangular, U-quadratic and Johnson-SB proposed in Cortina- Borja (2006) doi:10.1111/j.1467-985X.2006.00446_12.x distributions, among others.
